member.name: T:Mapgenix.Index.ExceptionDescription
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Index.ExceptionDescription.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Index.ExceptionDescription.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Index.ExceptionDescription.IndexFileIsInvalid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The format of your index file is not valid, please check. Or you can use BuildIndexFile function to build a new one..

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Index.ExceptionDescription.RtreeSpatialIndexIsNotOpen
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The RtreeSpatialIndex is not open. Please call the Open method before calling this method..

member.name: P:Mapgenix.Index.ExceptionDescription.SpatialIndexIsNotRemovable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The features in SpatialIndex are not removable..

member.name: T:Mapgenix.Index.RtreeSpatialIndex
member.summary: Spatial index for improving spatial access using minimum bounding rectangle
